other_tests.findings: Paced rhythm with no ectopy. A pacemaker rate of 88 beats per minute.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The initial ECG showed complete heart block and a ventricular escape rhythm of 30 to 33 beats per minute 6 years earlier.

other_tests.findings: Mild concentric left ventricular hypertrophy, ejection fraction of 54%, marked dilatation and hypokinesia of the right ventricle, moderate-to-severe tricuspid valve regurgitation, and evidence of pulmonary arterial hypertension.
other_tests.changes_over_time: No appreciable progression of aortic-valve calcification compared to earlier echocardiograms; right ventricular size and function significantly deteriorated.

other_tests.findings: Interstitial fibrosis, traction bronchiectasis, cystically dilated air spaces indicative of honeycomb fibrosis, pleural plaques, and diffuse alveolar damage with hyaline membranes.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The findings suggest progression of pulmonary asbestosis and development of an accelerated phase of chronic interstitial pneumonia.
